speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Sarah from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm okay, I guess. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I appreciate your response. I'm calling regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm your address for verification?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming. I see you have a balance of $250. What payment method would you prefer?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay with my credit card.

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I can assist you with that. Can you please provide your card details?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. I will process that payment now. Is there anything else you need help with?

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Your payment has been processed. Have a great day!
